title: Research Accepted for Publication
content: The GPU research paper I have been working on for the past year has been accepted for publication through IEEE/ACM International Conference on Big Data Computing, Applications and Technologies. This year, the conference is being held in Auckland, New Zealand.

title: Internship Completed
content: I have completed a three-month internship at Leidos, working on their Civil team that delivers air traffic control software to the FAA. I learned a lot of knowledge and experience participating in code reviews, working in complex code bases, and commutating with remote workers.

title: DEXA 2019 Submission
content: I have been working with a team of professors and a fellow student to prepare a research paper for submission at DEXA, a database conference being held in Linz, Austria. My role in the project has largely been revolved around the development of our CUDA and C++ source code.

title: Internship Accepted
content: I have just accepted a summer position with Leidos as a Software Engineer Intern. I will be working on their air traffic control software from their Eagan office.

title: Song of the Day
content: A song that I produced for my band, 'Fauna & Flora', was chosen to be the Song of the Day on 89.3 The Current.
